batchYeasts.description: This famous yeast strain from Weihenstephan in Germany is used world-wide within the brewing industry. SafLager W-34/70 allows to brew beers with a good balance of floral and fruity aromas and gives clean flavors and high drinkable beers.
batchYeasts.name: SafLager Lager

mashFermentables.name: Wheat Malt
